name: v1.3.9
body:
⭐️New Features

- Add console log prefix config support  #172

name: v1.3.8
body:
⭐️New Features

- Add ConfigSourceCacheWrapper to support config cache #159
- Add new feature variable linkedBlockingQueue from rabbitmq java client. #164

🔨 Optimize

- Make ExecutingRunnable public #167

name: v1.3.7
body:
🐞 Bug fixes

- Fix SofaConfigs throw ConcurrentModificationException in concurrence scene (#150)
- Fix level value in log-conf.xml (#148 )

name: v1.3.6
body:
🔨 Optimize

- LogCode2Description support multi config file
- LogCode2Description support format api

name: v1.3.5
body:
🐞 Bug fixes
- Fix ExecutingRunnable hashCode calculation bug

name: v1.3.4
body:
🐞 Bug fixes
Fix concurrent exception when use System.getProperties() #136

name: v1.3.3
body:
### 🐞 Bug fixes
- Fix logger factory lazy initialization problem #133

name: v1.3.2
body:
### 🐞 Bug fixes
- Fix performance problem related to LogCode2Description

name: v1.3.1
body:
🐞 Bug fixes

- fix usage in multi-classloader scenario for compatibility of commons-logging
- add deprecated methods in SofaThreadPoolExecutor to keep compatible

name: v1.3.0
body:
⭐️New Features

- Support SofaScheduledThreadPoolExecutor and SofaThreadPoolTaskScheduler
- Support SofaConfigs to support configuration acquires
- Support LogCode2Description to support log error code 

🔨 Optimize

- Refactor the sofa thread pool implement
- Unify the space used in all components

🐞 Bug fixes

- Fix the function of print the log to console doesn't take effect

name: v1.2.2
body:
🐞 Bug fixes
- Fix compatibililty for SOFABoot 3.4.5 and previous version.

name: v1.2.1
body:
🔨  Optimize
- Refactor the support for console logging #92
- Delete the starter and move it to sofa-boot #92

name: v1.2.0
body:
🐞 Bug fixes
- Remove the usage of SimpleDateFormat https://github.com/sofastack/sofa-common-tools/issues/76
- Support print stack when executing one runnable in different thread https://github.com/sofastack/sofa-common-tools/issues/78

🔨 Optimize
- Terminate the support of JDK 6 https://github.com/sofastack/sofa-common-tools/issues/77

name: v1.1.2
body:
🐞Bug fixes
- fix bug in SofaThreadPoolTaskExecutor threadPoolName setter https://github.com/sofastack/sofa-common-tools/issues/69

name: v1.1.1
body:
🐞Bug fixes
- fix getCallerClassLoader gets wrong classloader https://github.com/sofastack/sofa-common-tools/issues/67

name: v1.1.0
body: Add SOFA thread pool tools for finer-grain auditing.

name: v1.0.22
body:
🐞Bug fixes
- MutiAppLoggerSpaceManager use caller classloader default #58

name: v1.0.21
body:
🐞Bug fixes
- Use caller's classloader as default #52

name: v1.0.20
body:
🐞Bug fixes
- Set Log4j2LoggerSpaceFactory config from System Properties #51

name: v1.0.19
body:
### 1.兼容性说明
保持兼容

### 2.修复功能
*   修复在使用 log4j2 日志实现时，只能打印 Error 级别日志至 Console. #45

name: v1.0.18
body:
### 1.兼容性说明
保持兼容

### 2.修复功能
*   修复当配置 sofa.middleware.log.disable 时，配置解析失败；#43

name: v1.0.17
body:
### 1.兼容性说明
保持兼容

### 2.修复功能
*  修复  Log4j2 使用  ThreadContext 变量配置无效的问题 #39 
*  支持 SOFAArk 类隔离环境下的日志配置 #40

name: v1.0.16
body:
### 1.兼容性说明
修复 ReportUtil 工具类的兼容性问题。

### 2.修复功能
* 修复 v1.0.15 引入的不兼容性问题  #35

### 1.兼容性说明

ReportUtil 工具类不兼容，推荐使用 v1.0.16

### 2.修复功能

* 支持配置独立/全局日志空间控制台打印及日志级别控制  #20
* 支持日志空间级别通配符配置 #26
* 支持内部日志级别控制 #29
* 增加 log-sofa-boot-starter，适配 Spring Boot 环境

name: v1.0.14
body:
### 1.发布说明介绍

修复从 jar 中读取日志配置文件失败的问题

### 2.兼容性说明

与之前版本兼容。

### 3.修复功能

* 修复从 jar 中读取日志配置文件失败的问题 #25  @leizhiyuan

name: v1.0.13
body:
### 1.发布说明介绍

新增日志配置文件的优先选择能力；修复工具类用法的兼容问题

### 2.兼容性说明

与之前版本兼容。

### 3.新增功能

* 新增在同一个日志空间 SpaceId 即路径下通过添加配置文件 `config.properties`，实现日志配置文件的优先选择的能力，如：配置优先级参数  `priority=100`。同一个 SpaceId 即路径下选择优先级参数值最大的作为日志实际生效的日志配置 `log-conf.xml`。 #11  @ujjboy 

### 4.修复功能

* 修复工具类用法的兼容问题 #15 @guanchao-yang

name: v1.0.12
body:
### 1.发布说明介绍

支持应用和二方库（或者相关间接依赖）日志空间打印隔离的能力

### 2.兼容性说明

与之前版本兼容。

### 3.新增功能

* 日志空间隔离打印能力支持和优化，同时默认支持 Logback、Log4j2 和 Log4j 作为依赖的默认日志打印实现。
* 查找日志实现生效的优先级为：Logback > Log4j2 > Log4j
